action.description: Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).  Ayes, 15; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Aquino, Chang, Kim, Richards.  Noes, 10 (Senator(s) DeCorte, Elefante, Fevella, Fukunaga, Gabbard, Ihara, Inouye, Kidani, Moriwaki, Rhoads).  Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
